name: 2976 Leonore Faux Fur Lined Chelsea Boots - Women's

features:
Warm, hardwearing and winter-proof: WarmWair is soft, insulated lining crafted from carefully selected materials
The 2976 is the rugged Docs take on the classic Chelsea boot. Manufactured since the 70s
Atlas is a classic waxed aniline leather with a subtle pull-up and slight sheen
Upper: 70% Leather 30% Elastic
Inner: 90% Faux Fur / 10% Textile
Sole: 100% PVC
Material
Classic smooth, waxed leather coloured with soluble dyes. With a subtle ombre and satin sheen finish.
Construction: Goodyear Welted
